title: Manage the Final Walk-Through
description: The buyer's agent coordinates and conducts the final walk-through of the property just before closing.

tasks.description: Schedule the final walk-through with the buyer and the listing agent, typically 24 hours before closing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The walk-through is scheduled at an appropriate time.

tasks.description: During the walk-through, verify that all negotiated repairs have been completed and the property is in the same condition as when the offer was made.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the property's condition meets contractual requirements.

tasks.description: If issues are found, immediately contact the listing agent and closing attorney to resolve them before the closing appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Any last-minute problems are addressed and resolved prior to closing.
